entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New Carlisle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 3:00 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
